title: FS: Walter Johnson T206 portrait (raw, fair-poor)
author: square5000

posts.post_title: FS: Walter Johnson T206 portrait (raw, fair-poor)
posts.post_content:
SOLD

Hi!

I have a raw Walter Johnson T206 portrait for sale.
This card has obvious creasing and wrinkles on the front, plus rounded corners. The Piedmont back has a bit of paper loss.

Asking $200, firm.  SOLD
I accept Paypal, check or money order.

Scans are below. I apologize for the small back scan. I'm happy to try to re-scan it if requested.

Thanks for looking!
Peter Baldes
square5000 on eBay

[URL="http://farm7.static.flickr.com/6064/6114063937_a0958b1b3a_b.jpg"][IMG]http://farm7.static.flickr.com/6064/6114063937_a0958b1b3a_b.jpg[/IMG][/URL][URL="http://farm7.static.flickr.com/6191/6114612242_2e93e21bf9_z.jpg/"][IMG]http://farm7.static.flickr.com/6191/6114612242_2e93e21bf9_z.jpg[/IMG][/URL]

If still available, I'll take the Johnson.

Mike
Great card. Just the right kind of condition + eye appeal that I target for my small wallet. Wish I'd have seen it earlier and I think I'd have tried to scrape the funds together.
